mapper.select: select c.* from(select b.* from(select rownum as rnum, a.timeline_n, a.user_id, a.content, substr(a.time,0,14),a.name from(select t.*, m.name from timeline t, member m where t.user_id = m.user_id order by time desc)a)b where b.rnum < #{endnum})c where c.rnum >= #{startnum}
select timeline.timeline_n, timeline.content, substr(time,0,14) as time, member.name from timeline,member where timeline.user_id = member.user_id order by timeline_n desc
select timeline.timeline_n, timeline.content, substr(time,0,14) as time, member.name from timeline,member where timeline.user_id = member.user_id and rownum < 5 order by timeline_n desc
select content from timeline where timeline_n = #{timeline_n}
mapper.update: update timeline set content = #{content} where timeline_n = #{timeline_n}
